sentences.english: Objective To study the therapeutic effect of biological amnion covering on early severe ocular burn.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨生物羊膜在早期重度眼表烧伤中的临床疗效。

sentences.english: The use of extra-amniotic saline infusion with a balloon catheter or a double balloon catheter (Atad ripener) also appears to be effective for cervical ripening.
sentences.chinese: 用羊膜外单或双气囊氏导管也是宫颈成熟的有效方法。

sentences.english: Amniocentesis is the standard prenatal detection procedure for aneuploidy .
sentences.chinese: 羊膜穿刺术是出生前检测非整倍体的金标准。

sentences.english: The amniotic sac breaks and is expelled in the third stage of labor.
sentences.chinese: 在第三产程，羊膜囊破裂并被排出。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the curative effect on acute eye burn treated with fresh amnion transplantation.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察新鲜羊膜移植治疗急性期眼表烧伤的疗效。

sentences.english: Effect of silicone oil on corneal endothelium of rabbit eyes;
sentences.chinese: 探讨羊膜移植术在角膜缘缺陷兔眼表面的作用。

sentences.english: Examples of diagnostic tests include amniocentesis and chorionic villus sampling.
sentences.chinese: 的例子，诊断测试，包括羊膜穿刺术和绒毛取样。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the feasibility and effect of fresh multilayer amniotic membrane transplantations (AMT) for the reconstruction of corneal ulcers .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨新鲜多层羊膜移植治疗角膜溃疡的效果。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the feasibility of technique in treatment of Mooren ulcer by transplantation fresh amnion.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察新鲜羊膜移植治疗蚕食性角膜溃疡的可行性。

sentences.english: Fluid in the amniotic sac surrounding the fetus also contains fetal DNA.
sentences.chinese: 羊膜中的液体包围这胎儿同样含有胎儿的DNA。

sentences.english: A protective fluid-filled amniotic sac encloses and cushions the fetus.
sentences.chinese: 充满液体的羊膜包裹并保护胎儿缓和震动。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the application of amniotic membrane in conjunctival sac plasty.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结羊膜在结膜囊成形术中的应用及临床疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effects of fresh amniotic membrane transplantation in the acute phase of ocular alkali burn.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察新鲜羊膜移植治疗急性期眼部碱烧伤的疗效。

sentences.english: Conclusion Fresh multilayer AMT is a very effective method to treat corneal ulcers .
sentences.chinese: 结论新鲜多层羊膜移植是治疗角膜溃疡的有效方法。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate clinical value of transabdominal intra-amniotic perfusion for treatment of fetal growth restriction(FGR).
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨羊膜腔内灌注治疗胎儿生长受限的临床价值。

sentences.english: Amniocentesis is the most commonly prescribed invasive test performed during pregnancies in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 羊膜穿刺术是美国在妊娠期最常女性都会感到害怕。

definition: trophoblastic layer (attaches fertilized ovum to the uterus)/trophoderm
yolk sac (ectodermal cells attaching fetus to uterus before the development of the placenta)
